name: puma-scan-pro-build-task
description: Puma Scan is a software security source code analysis extension that scans code for vulnerabilities, generates security reports, and enforces security requirements.
author: Puma Security, LLC

inputs.name: outputFilename
inputs.label: Path to Output File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Output file name for the scan results [MyApplication-PumaScan]. The file extension will automatically be added for each selected format.

inputs.name: settingsFilename
inputs.label: Path to Settings file.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Puma Scan custom scan settings file location [.pumafile]

inputs.name: license
inputs.label: Puma Scan License
inputs.helpMarkDown: Copy the Puma Scan Professional Azure license from your Puma Scan account and store the value in a secret Pipeline variable. Then, reference the variable name in the build step. E.g. $(PumaLicense)

inputs.name: verboseMode
inputs.label: Verbose
inputs.helpMarkDown: Writes verbose output to the console: instance details, errors, etc.
